name: Skyrim: Return of The Blades
short_description:
Return of the Blades is a mod for Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. The mod revolves around the Dragonborn PC and the Blades. One thing left out of the original game was the players role as leader of the Blades. This mod seeks to change that and the responsibilities you have once you become leader. The main features of this mod are as follows:

*Become the Grandmaster of the Blades
*Appoint senior member positions
*Personally train Blades and perform their final test
*Send members on missions in the name of the Order
*Stronghold that scales in size with your membership
*Unique Storyline beginning midway through the game
                
                 <<<<More Coming Soon>>>>>>>
